data.eml:eml: A new genus of Trechini beetles from the Eastern Himalaya (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Belousov, Igor A., Kabak, Ilya I., Schmidt, Joachim (2019): A new genus of Trechini beetles from the Eastern Himalaya (Coleoptera: Carabidae). Zootaxa 4544 (4): 581-588, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4544.4.8
